mil7.8.3:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘chattassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.8.3:1.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kilesānaṁ upari muddhani carena bhavitabbaṁ.
mil7.8.3:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, chattassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.8.3:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, chattaṁ muddhanupatthambhaṁ hoti;
mil7.8.3:2.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yoniso manasikārupatthambhena bhavitabbaṁ.
mil7.8.3:2.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, chattassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.8.3:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, chattaṁ vātātapameghavuṭṭhiyo paṭihanati;
mil7.8.3:3.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nānāvidhadiṭṭhiputhusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ matavāta-tividhaggisantāpakilesavuṭṭhiyo paṭihantabbā.
mil7.8.3:3.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, chattassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
